title: RIOT ZAPS
body: played aram with riot zaps :) idk if u cant remember me zaps but I was the lissandra using the red skin :D{{champion:127}} {{champion:42}}

replies.body:
Hi! 

Was a fun game! I didn't realise how much fun AP Kogmaw is post AP item rework!  

Was a fun pokey game, lots of good Liss ults on me as well - wp!
You lost all credibility when you didn't roll freelosandra.
